description:
SQL Server 2014 Express is a free edition of SQL Server that is ideal for learning, developing, and powering desktop, web, and small server applications and for redistribution by ISVs. 
	
	This package uses the MSSQLSERVER instance name ("Use Default Instance" installation option) instead of the SQLEXPRESS instance name (which is, confusingly, the default).
	
	Based on the MsSqlServer2014Express package. This only installs SQL Server Express. The SQL Server Express Management Tools are provided in a seperate package.
summary: Installs SQL Server 2014 Express as default instance
author: Microsoft
